sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均可表示"可尊敬的"之意。
means: respectable ： 指因品质、人格或身份等高尚或高贵而受到他人的尊敬。
respectful ： 指对人表示尊敬或敬意。

sentence.Network_en: The patient has the right to considerate and respectful care.
sentence.Network_cn: 病人有权得到周到而礼貌的照顾。

sentence.Network_en: The children in our family are always respectful to their elders.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们家的孩子对长辈总是恭恭敬敬的。

sentence.Network_en: He was always so polite and respectful.
sentence.Network_cn: 他总是彬彬有礼，尊敬他人。

entry.tran: 尊重人的;有礼貌的;恭敬的
entry.def: If you are respectful, you show respect for someone.

example.ex: He was always so polite and respectful...
example.tran: 他总是彬彬有礼，尊敬他人。

example.ex: The children in our family are always respectful to their elders...
example.tran: 我们家的孩子对长辈总是恭恭敬敬的。

auth_sentence.content: David said Ed had been "very respectful".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: David said Ed had been "very respectful".

auth_sentence.content: The interviewers were respectful, the vets were encouraged.
auth_sentence.res_content: The interviewers were respectful, the vets were encouraged.

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

Sentence.sentence: One has to be respectful of other people in order to win respect.

sentences.en: He is respectful to his elders.
She received guests with a respectful attitude.
sentences.cn: 她恭恭敬敬地接待了客人。

sentences.en: He behaves in a respectful way.
